beforeStartingText1: By clicking 'START', Admin account will be created. Admin account has all of the permissions including database settings.
beforeStartingText2: You can set 'Automatic database backup' in Settings page. Automatic backup option is highly recommended. Manual backup is also available.
beforeStartingText3: If your database is corrupted, restore it with one of the backups. You can restore database with backup in Settings page.
beforeStartingText4: If you want to reset the system, you can do it in Settings page. Simply deleting the main database file will work the same way.
beforeStartingText5: CAUTION: This is an open source software. We are not responsible for any damage caused by this software in both directly and indirectly.
beforeStartingText6: Please read the license agreement (Click here) before start. You can read it in 'About' page. as well.
disabledNextTooltip: Please fill in all the fields
usernameTooltip: You can't change the username of admin account
